DOC.brief_summary: This study determine characteristic absorption , metabolism , excretion ( AME ) RDEA3170 follow single 10 mg dose RDEA3170 oral solution 500 microcuries ( µCi ) [ 14 C ] RDEA3170 healthy adult male subject .
DOC.criteria: Body weight ≥ 50 kg ( 110 lb . ) body mass index ≥ 18 ≤ 30 kg/m2 . No clinically relevant abnormality vital sign , ECG , physical examination safety laboratory value . Screening serum urate level ≤ 7.0 mg/dL . Subject minimum 1 bowel movement day . History suspicion kidney stone . History gastrointestinal ulcer , Helicobacter pylorus infection , disorder gastric pH . History previous surgery stomach small intestine ( appendectomy acceptable ) . Subject donate blood experienced significant blood loss ( > 450 mL ) within 12 week prior Day 1 give plasma donation within 6 week prior Day 1 . Inadequate venous access unsuitable vein repeat venipuncture .
